Resistance.display_help: Rikti Mentalist armor makes them are resistant to Lethal, Smashing, and Energy damage. Their enhanced mental powers also make them resistant to Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Psionic damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Smash, Lethal, Energy, Psionic
Resistance.display_target_help: Rikti Mentalist armor makes them are resistant to Lethal, Smashing, and Energy damage. Their enhanced mental powers also make them resistant to Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Psionic damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Smash, Lethal, Energy, Psionic
